description: Performs the FFT of the input dataset in 3 directions (x, y, z) and produces the output dataset.

abs.title: Magnitude of FFT flag
abs.description: Outputs the magnitude of the FFT (default)

phase.title: Phase of FFT flag
phase.description: Outputs the phase of the FFT (-PI..PI)

inverse.title: Inverse FFT flag
inverse.description: Does the inverse FFT instead of the forward FFT

Lx.title: FFT length in x-direction
Lx.description: Use FFT of length 'xx' in the x-direction

Ly.title: FFT length in y-direction
Ly.description: Use FFT of length 'yy' in the y-direction

Lz.title: FFT length in z-direction
Lz.description: Use FFT of length 'zz' in the z-direction

altIN.title: Alternate input signs flag
altIN.description: Alternate signs of input data before FFT to bring zero frequency from edge of FFT-space to center of grid for cosmetic purposes.

altOUT.title: Alternate output signs flag
altOUT.description: Alternate signs of output data after FFT. Use '-altOUT' with '-altIN' on the forward transform to get the signs of the recovered image correct.

input.title: Input file
input.description: Read the input dataset from specified file instead of from the last argument on the command line.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Use specified prefix for the output dataset.
